verses.roman:
ethā govinda mahāprabhura śabda nā pāñā
svarūpere bolāila kapāṭa khuliyā

synonyms: ethā—here; govinda—Govinda; mahāprabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; śabda—sound; nā pāñā—not getting; svarūpere—Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī; bolāila—called for; kapāṭa—the doors; khuliyā—opening.
translation: Meanwhile, not hearing any sounds from Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, Govinda immediately sent for Svarūpa Dāmodara and opened the doors.
